message:
"Liberty's Waltz"

Freedom born dances, invisible hand's guide.
Chains stark against quiet skies,
Heart-bound fury divulges our stride.

Invisible hand's guide,
Ripe fruit, untouched, secret lies,
Freedom born dances.

Market's quicksilver tide,
Invisible hand's guide.
Freewheeling tempest criticized.

Heart-bound fury divulges our stride,
Open eyes recognize hidden pride,
Invisible hand's guide.

Freedom born dances,
Heart-bound fury divulges our stride.
